Home Entertainment ‘Dream Chaser’ – The meaning of 46 tattoos of Odell Beckham Jr, the most expensive player in the world

‘Dream Chaser’ – The meaning of 46 tattoos of Odell Beckham Jr, the most expensive player in the world

Entertainment Dua Lipa · 16/08/2023

The Cleveland Browns are the NFL team that Odell Beckham Jr. plays for. He is regarded as one of the best and most well-liked players in American football. His football career peaked in 2016 when he amassed 200 career receptions and 4000 career receiving yards, making him the quickest athlete in NFL history. The athlete has several significant tattoos on his body in addition to a successful sporting career. Let's look at it!

'Portrait of Barack Obama' tattooed on his right thigh.

Meaning: From 2009 to 2017, Barack Obama served as the 44th President of the United States. He served as America's first African-American president. Ganga, the tattoo artist, inked this portrait ink in December 2017. Odell posted the following image of his tattoo on his Instagram account on December 6, 2017, along with the caption,

Body in Harlem marked up like a subway...dial them! I'm Weezy F Baby.

'Health Ledger Joker' tattooed on his right thigh.

Meaning: The 2008 film "The Dark Knight," which featured the fictional figure Joker, was released. Heath Ledger, an Australian actor, portrayed this role.

'WHY SO SERIOUS?' is inked on the body. His right thigh is inked.

Meaning: In the film "The Dark Knight," Joker is known for saying, "WHY SO SERIOUS?"

'Michael Jackson-Thriller' tattooed on her right leg.

Meaning: The appearance of Michael Jackson from his 1984 album "Thriller" served as the inspiration for this tattoo. Ganga, the tattoo artist, tattooed this tattoo in December 2017.

'Lil Wayne' is inked on his right thigh.

Lil Wayne is a rapper, singer, songwriter, businessman, and actor who is from the United States.

'Love Symbol-Prince' tattooed on his right leg.

Meaning: On October 13, 1992, American music artist Prince released a studio album under the title "Love Symbol."

'Portrait of Jesse Owens' tattooed on his right thigh.

Jesse Owens was a track and field athlete from the United States. When he won four gold medals at the 1936 Olympics, he shot to fame.

Tattoo: ‘Portrait of Malcolm X’ tattoo on his right leg.

Meaning: Malcolm was an American Muslim minister who is popular within African-American and Muslim American groups for his pursuit of racial justice. He was also a human-rights activist who gained a lot of limelight during civil rights movements.

Tattoo: ‘Martin Luther King Jr.’ tattoo on his right leg.

Meaning: Martin Luther King Jr. was an American Christian activist who was known for his active role in the civil rights movement for fighting against racism through non-violence and civil disobedience.

Tattoo: ‘Portrait of Muhammad Ali’ tattoo on his right leg.

Meaning: Muhammad Ali was an American professional boxer who is known as one of the best boxers in the world.

Tattoo: ‘Portrait of Tupac Shakur’ tattoo on his right leg.

Meaning: Tupac Shakur was an American rapper. He is considered one of the most famous rappers in the world. He was also famous for his strong resistance against racism and injustice.

Tattoo: ‘Prince’ tattoo on his right leg.

Meaning: Prince was an American singer, songwriter, musician, actor, and dancer. He is also ranked as Billboard’s Top 100 Artists of All Time list.

Tattoo: ‘Allen Iverson stepping over Tyronn Lue’ tattoo on her right thigh.

Meaning: On June 6, 2001, the American professional basketball player ‘Allen Iverson’ stepped over another American professional basketball player and coach ‘Tyronn Lue’ in NBA finals. Odell got the tattoo of this incident inked on his right thigh.

Tattoo: ‘Raised Fist’ tattoo on her right leg.

Meaning: Raised fist tattoo is a symbol of strength, power, unity, and resistance.

Tattoo: ‘Portrait of Bob Marley’ tattoo on his right thigh.

Meaning: Bob Marley was a Jamaican singer and songwriter. He is also known as the symbol of the music of Jamaica.

Tattoo: ‘Lion’ tattoo on his left thigh.

Meaning: Lion tattoo is a symbol of power, strength, courage, authority, and leadership.

Tattoo: ’13’ tattoo on his right arm.

Meaning: The number ’13’ refers to the jersey number of Odell for Cleveland Browns. This tattoo was inked by the tattoo artist, Bang Bang.

Odell Beckham Jr. getting the tattoo of ‘The Creation of Adam’ by the tattoo artist, Romeo Lacoste, in 2019

Tattoo: ‘The Creation of Adam’ tattoo on his right hand.

Meaning: This tattoo was inked by the tattoo artist, Romeo Lacoste, in 2019. ‘The Creation of Adam’ is a painting by an Italian artist, Michelangelo.

Tattoo: ‘Tiny Heart’ tattoo near his right wrist.

Meaning: Heart tattoo is a symbol of emotions, love, feelings, passion, compassion, trust, loyalty, and friendship.

Tattoo: ‘Golden Gate Bridge’ tattoo on his back.

Meaning: The back tattoos on Odell Beckham’s back are all done by the tattoo artist, Bang Bang, in 2016. Bang Bang took four complete days to cover Odell’s entire back with tattoos. Golden Gate Bridge is a bridge that connects San Francisco and the Pacific Ocean.

Tattoo: ‘Planet of the Apes’ tattoo on his back.

Meaning: ‘Planet of the Apes’ is an American science fiction franchise in which there is a fight for control between humans and intelligent groups of apes. This tattoo was inked by the tattoo artist, Bang Bang.
